item.title: Rust
item.description: Tutorial https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/ https://youtu.be/MsocPEZBd-M Install curl --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh Uninstall rustup self uninstall Cargo cargo new --bin rust_quickstart Cheatsheet
